name: Tactical Control
description: Tactical Control: the 7-minute wargame. Simplified strategy with minimalist graphics and quick, intense games. Play short matches against random opponents. Fight tense battles of stealth, anticipation and surprise. Win with strategy, deception and cleverness, not with reflexes and clicking speed.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: DX9 DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 512 MB available space
